title: Identity Prioritization isn't a Backlog Problem - It's a Risk Math Problem
description: Most identity programs still prioritize work the way they prioritize IT tickets: by volume, loudness, or “what failed a control check.” That approach breaks the moment your environment stops being mostly-human and mostly-onboarded.
